name: Mission Control Word Games: Homonyms, Antonyms, and Synonyms
description:
Mission Control Word Games: Homonyms, Antonyms, and Synonyms is a space-themed series of English learning games for multiple systems.

Contains three games:
  • Black Hole Homonyms - A sentence is displayed, and the player must select the correct homonyms as two rapidly blink on the screen.
  • Asteroid Antonyms - The player must properly align a list of scrolling antonyms.
  • Star Ship Synonyms - The player must properly align a list of scrolling synonyms.
alsoFor: Apple II, DOS, TRS-80 | Combined View
